.. index:: LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279:

LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory A
============================================

:viewcode:`lodo.spad line 1 <lodo.spad#L1>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <lodo.spad#L1>`

* A: \ :ref:`Ring <l52696e67>`\ 


\ ``LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory``\  is the category of differential operators with coefficients in a ring A with a given derivation. Multiplication of operators corresponds to functional composition: \ ``(L1 * L2).(f) = L1 L2 f``\ 


.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-30:

\ :ref:`0 <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964-30>`\ \: % 
  from \ :ref:`AbelianMonoid <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-44:

.. index::
   pair: LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory; D

:spadfun:`D`\: () -> % 
  \ ``D()``\  provides the operator corresponding to a derivation in the ring \ ``A``\ .

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-646567726565:

\ :ref:`degree <l4d61796265536b6577506f6c796e6f6d69616c43617465676f7279-646567726565>`\ \: (%, \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`SingletonAsOrderedSet <l53696e676c65746f6e41734f726465726564536574>`\ ) -> \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-64697265637453756d:

.. index::
   pair: LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory; directSum

:spadfun:`directSum`\: (%, %) -> % if A has \ :ref:`Field <l4669656c64>`\ 
  \ ``directSum(a, b)``\  computes an operator \ ``c``\  of minimal order such that the nullspace of \ ``c``\  is generated by all the sums of a solution of \ ``a``\  by a solution of \ ``b``\ .

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-656c74:

  from \ :ref:`Eltable <l456c7461626c65>`\ (A, A)

\ :ref:`support <l467265654d6f64756c6543617465676f7279-737570706f7274>`\ \: % -> \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\  
  from \ :ref:`FreeModuleCategory <l467265654d6f64756c6543617465676f7279>`\ (A, \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\ )

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-73796d6d6574726963506f776572:

.. index::
   pair: LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory; symmetricPower

:spadfun:`symmetricPower`\: (%, \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\ ) -> % if A has \ :ref:`Field <l4669656c64>`\ 
  \ ``symmetricPower(a, n)``\  computes an operator \ ``c``\  of minimal order such that the nullspace of \ ``c``\  is generated by all the products of \ ``n``\  solutions of \ ``a``\ .

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-73796d6d657472696350726f64756374:

.. index::
   pair: LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory; symmetricProduct

:spadfun:`symmetricProduct`\: (%, %) -> % if A has \ :ref:`Field <l4669656c64>`\ 
  \ ``symmetricProduct(a, b)``\  computes an operator \ ``c``\  of minimal order such that the nullspace of \ ``c``\  is generated by all the products of a solution of \ ``a``\  by a solution of \ ``b``\ .

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-73796d6d6574726963537175617265:

.. index::
   pair: LinearOrdinaryDifferentialOperatorCategory; symmetricSquare

:spadfun:`symmetricSquare`\: % -> % if A has \ :ref:`Field <l4669656c64>`\ 
  \ ``symmetricSquare(a)``\  computes \ ``symmetricProduct(a, a)``\  using a more efficient method.

.. _l4c696e6561724f7264696e617279446966666572656e7469616c4f70657261746f7243617465676f7279-746f74616c446567726565:

\ :ref:`totalDegree <l4d61796265536b6577506f6c796e6f6d69616c43617465676f7279-746f74616c446567726565>`\ \: % -> \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\  
  from \ :ref:`MaybeSkewPolynomialCategory <l4d61796265536b6577506f6c796e6f6d69616c43617465676f7279>`\ (A, \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\ , \ :ref:`SingletonAsOrderedSet <l53696e676c65746f6e41734f726465726564536574>`\ )
